/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling scene on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the surroundings. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. 

On either side of the highway, lush green trees and bushes line the roadside, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The road itself is filled with several cars and trucks, indicating a busy time of day. 

In the center of the image, a large billboard stands out, although the content of the billboard is not visible in the image. The overall scene is a typical day on a highway in a city, with vehicles moving along the road and the surrounding greenery providing a contrast to the urban environment.
